name: Floaty
description:
If you like doughnuts, you’re going to LOVE this!

Along with the super fun floaty doughnut game, with original music by TYJ! there's FREE Recipes for 25 of the best doughnuts you could want, a bunch of hints & tips for how to make the floatiest doughnuts you can and something special you can get involved with too!

Fun fact! Did you know -
The tallest stack of doughnuts ever measured was over 1.1 metres tall. It was built in 2007 to celebrate the premiere of the Simpsons movie. A team of eight people built it in a pyramid type shape from 1,764 ring doughnuts!

Recipes include popular favourites such as:
Piineapple
Jammin’ Jam
Classic Choc
Bacon (yes bacon!)
Lamington,
Cacao and Chia
& so many more all inside this free app!

This initiative is in support of The Starlight Children's Foundation, take a look, enjoy and feel free to help out if you can!

brought to you but the team at cooking at home is fun
